post_title: FS: Polar Bears, Old Mill, and Double Name
post_content:
I have the following T206 Cards for sale:

Polar Bear George Bell - Pithing Follow Through (Double Name) - SGC 3 - $175
Polar Bear Bill Clancy - SGC 3 - $Sold
Polar Bear Moose Grimshaw - SGC 3 - $145
Old Mill Red Kleinow - Boston (Name on Top) - SGC 2 - $235

All prices include shipping.

Please really look at the two double name cards, especially the Kleinow.  The corners are really nice for the grade.  It's clearly an older grading model that really penalized you for a miscut, even though the name on top is desirable. There is a scratch on the front of the Bell slab.

Please note: I have over 150 graded T206 cards available.  I'll be listing them here, but email me at [url]jcotgreave@gmail.com[/url] if you'd like a list.

If you want to purchase any cards:
1. The first person to post a full price offer on this thread will get the card.
2. Email me at [url]jcotgreave@gmail.com[/url] and let me know which card(s) you want.
3. Remit payment by PayPal - FF or venmo.
4. Cards will be shipped within 2 business days.

Shot you an email for your list. 

Thanks. 

Scott
